<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:firework_explosion}}: The explosion effect stored by this [[firework star]].
*** {{nbt|string|shape}}: The shape of the explosion. Can be {{cd|d=or|small_ball|large_ball|star|creeper|burst}}.
*** {{nbt|list|colors}}: The colors of the initial particles of the explosion, randomly selected from.
**** {{nbt|int}} A color as a packed integer
*** {{nbt|list|fade_colors}}: The colors of the fading particles of the explosion, randomly selected from.
**** {{nbt|int}} A color as a packed integer
*** {{nbt|boolean|has_trail}}: Whether or not the explosion has a trail effect (diamond).
*** {{nbt|boolean|has_twinkle}}: Whether or not the explosion has a twinkle effect (glowstone dust).<!--
